mapper.select: SELECT c.COMM_NO, c.COMM_CONTENT, u.USER_NAME, c.POST_NO, c.COMM_CLASS, c.COMM_ORDER, c.COMM_GROUP FROM COMMENT_TABLE c JOIN USER_TABLE u ON c.COMM_AUTHOR = u.USER_ID WHERE c.POST_NO = #{postNo} GROUP BY c.COMM_NO, c.COMM_CONTENT, u.USER_NAME, c.POST_NO, c.COMM_CLASS, c.COMM_ORDER, c.COMM_GROUP ORDER BY c.COMM_NO ASC
